statements: DELETE FROM voting_statistics WHERE voter_id = 100 AND vote_date < '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM voting_statistics WHERE vote_choice = 'Yes' AND participation_rate > 50.00;
DELETE FROM voting_statistics WHERE voter_id = 1001 AND vote_option = 'Option A';
DELETE FROM participation_rates WHERE participation_date < '2022-01-01' AND participation_percent < 50.00;
DELETE FROM voting_statistics WHERE voter_id = 1 AND date = '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM governance_performance WHERE date < '2022-06-01' AND performance_rating < 4.0;
DELETE FROM voting_statistics WHERE voter_id = 123 AND vote_option = 'Yes';
